plot: A stone-made angel decides to take off the monument where he was built to follow travelling birds. But this wish of liberty won't be so easy...
title: Migrations
plot_es: A stone-made angel decides to take off the monument where he was built to follow travelling birds. But this wish of liberty won't be so easy...
plot_en: A stone-made angel decides to take off the monument where he was built to follow travelling birds. But this wish of liberty won't be so easy...
